roleset.name: to leap beyond something else

role.descr: first leaper who is leaping beyond something else

example.name: All args
example.text: Indeed, over-the-counter stocks, led by technology issues, outleaped the industrial average.
example.arg: over-the-counter stocks, led by technology issues

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire
